name: ilydeck
description: ILYDeck is an innovative web application that brings the joy of card games to life. Play a variety of classic and custom card games, designed and curated for endless entertainment. Whether you're mastering familiar favorites or exploring unique new creations, ILYDeck offers a versatile, engaging platform for card game enthusiasts

scripts.buildAndRun: cd client && vite build && cd .. && node server/server.js

author: ILYTAT Games
